definition: erhua variant of 搞花樣|搞花样[gao3 hua1 yang4]
erhua variant of 變樣|变样[bian4 yang4]

sentences.english: Well, you know what a canadian chipmunk looks like?
sentences.chinese: 那你知道一隻加拿大花栗鼠長什麼樣兒的嗎？

sentences.english: You can make a dress from this paper pattern.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用這個紙樣兒做一套衣服。

sentences.english: I ended up getting him one sample of nearly every item from the menu.
sentences.chinese: 我最後差不多每樣兒給他買了一份回去。

sentences.english: I like either coffee or tea .
sentences.chinese: 咖啡和茶，我喜歡一樣兒。

sentences.english: She can just sit there and sings children's songs to Chloe for like an hour without repeating.
sentences.chinese: 她能坐在那給小克唱童謠唱上一個小時不帶重樣兒的。

sentences.english: But I still don't know what sort of guy that Ts'ao fellow is.
sentences.chinese: 可是我到現在不知道那姓曹的是什麼樣兒的人。

sentences.english: Well, how I dress up could have an impact on my corporate image.
sentences.chinese: 這麼說，我穿成什麼樣兒也會影響到公司的形象了。

sentences.english: How times have changed since then.
sentences.chinese: 時光飛逝，十里洋場已經大變樣兒了。

sentences.english: The galley proof dares unarmed to dial my gun unexpectedly?
sentences.chinese: 小樣兒的居然敢徒手來撥我的槍？

sentences.english: The performance of canine parvovirus What is it like?
sentences.chinese: 犬細小病毒的表現是什麼樣兒的？

sentences.english: The styles of all the houses in this program are similar.
sentences.chinese: 該項規劃中所有的房屋樣兒都差不多。

sentences.english: These two pens are alike except that they're different colours.
sentences.chinese: 這兩支筆樣兒差不多，色兒不一樣。

sentences.english: He is a good sort (of a fellow).
Mother Hucheloup, his wife, was a bearded and a very homely creature.
sentences.chinese: 他的老伴於什魯大媽是個生着鬍子模樣兒怪醜的婦人。

sentences.english: We will generalize the question if we go on discussing this way.
sentences.chinese: 照咱們這樣兒討論下去，可就把問題泛化了。

sentences.english: I can't remember everything on it.
sentences.chinese: 我沒法兒記住上面的每樣兒東西。
